titleStmt.title: M. S. Lile to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG11957

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 863 GREEN COUNTY Reccomendations for Nominations 46th Rgt. Ky. Militia

body.p:
December 23/63
Greens Burg Green County Ky
Maj D W Lindsey

Sir owing to the my health I have Declined the notion of Excepting of any commision what ever owing my Being wounded through the Right chest And hand I would at the present time Recommend John T. Sandidge owing to his Being a stout able Boddied man and a man well qualifiede to fill that office I fuly in tended at the time that Col. George J. Rolston Recomended me to to except of the office you will thare fore excuse me owing to the condition of my health

Green
Ky. State Mil
Green Co
Lt Col. M. S. Lisle
Declined
Dec. 23, 1863
Com ordered for J T. Sandige
Recd I. G. O. Dec. 25. 1863
